---
title: "Informatics Workshop Package Installation"
---

Install packages need for the workshop by running the code chunk below: click the *Run* button within the chunk or place your cursor inside it and press *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}

install.packages(c("rmarkdown", "tidyverse", "DBI", "RSQLite", "devtools"))

library(devtools)

install_github("k96nb01/immunogenetr_package")

```
